newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Storeco details capitalisation share award.
newsitem.headline: Storeco details capitalisation share award.

text.p: Storeco Ltd said on Monday that shareholders registered in the firm's books on June 27 will receive capitalisation shares.

It said that the ratio of the award will be based on the weighted average of the traded prices of the shares on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange for the three days ending July 24. This will then be discounted by a factor of six percent to five rise to the ordinary issue price.
The award of "N" shares to "N" shareholders will be made on the same basis.
Shareholders can elect instead to receive a 3.7 cents cash dividend.
